title: Ticket #4245: Python bindngs should support high-availability collector setups
description:
Internally, we use the CollectorList object to power the htcondor.Collector object in the python bindings.

However, we use CollectorList::create(...) method to create the list; this doesn't support passing a list of collectors, only a single hostname.

This also comes up because this works: 

_condor_COLLECTOR_HOST=glidein-collector.t2.ucsd.edu,glidein-collector-2.t2.ucsd.edu condor_status -schedd

But this doesn't 

condor_status -pool glidein-collector.t2.ucsd.edu,glidein-collector-2.t2.ucsd.edu -schedd

I propose to extend CollectorList::create to accept a string list and to extend the python bindings to accept a python list object.
